name: Eye Sore
description:
Explore a hell-scape by plucking out your eyeballs in this puzzle platformer! You explore a gruesome environment as you solve puzzles. Replacing your eyes gives you different powers, allowing you to progress through the world. A keen eye along with precise jumping will let you to get to the end of this horror themed game!

Made in 48 hours for the CPGD Spring Gam Jam "Eye of the Beholder".

Controls:

WASD - Move

LMB - Interact

RMB - Rip eye out

LShift - Sprint

Eyeballs:

Red - Demon eye

Blue - Normal eye

Green - Key

Purple - Double Jump
